snippet.title: Ova Magica ► Top Hat Showcase + Early Access Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Releasing July 23rd into Steam Early Access!

Welcome to Clover Town! Befriend blobs, explore themed dungeons, and maybe meet the love of your life in this creature collector meets social sim JRPG! When not battling fellow blob trainers or making friends with (or doing errands for) the people of Clover Town, tend to your quaint little farmstead, where you grow & craft ingredients & materials to not only strengthen your blobs and make money... but also unlock new worlds full of adventures...

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1299170/Ova_Magica/
